channel.title: Problems making script work without me being there
channel.description:
Well I had read some of the codes and tried the auto fighter script...however all I could do was move my mouse to turn off the chat entirely and auto right click for me. Other than that it got my mouse stuck shaking in the upper left corner of my screen. I had chosen the client window with the cross hair, I selected the grey walkway color with the color picker, I had told the script to run...but i doesn't do much good...
My next problem is there are many good scripts on this forum but ppl don't post the scripts so how do you get it?
k now I got the script and I followed the instructions but....my cursor just runs in circles and right clicks random things =\
Thx so much for your help

item.title: Problems making script work without me being there
item.dc:creator: @maleficus maleficus
item.description:
@maleficus wrote:

take the crosshairs just above the main SCAR window and drag them onto the runescape applet/client/screen.

Read full topic
item.source: Problems making script work without me being there

item.title: Problems making script work without me being there
item.dc:creator: @Reaver Reaver
item.description:
@Reaver wrote:

It’s much the same for me, but with LESS CLICKING. Lol, I’m working on it right now. When I know the answer, you’ll know the answer. >>

Read full topic
